attributes.action: Stop our so called boses from saying we need to reduce costs whilst taking money out of the company for themselves.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We here everyday that companies now are saying we need to cut cost. Well let start at the top of companies with our so called boses and hanger-oners by at least being paid the same as what you pay us. What gives them the right to say we should be paid £10,000 a year but pay themselves millions, just look at MPs. We need to start making a stand against these people. Before any decisions are made they should take a look at themselves first.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
